responses.title: I'll paint this world as I see fit.
The strokes of my brush mark your fate.
I alone hold back the ink tide.
I'll paint this world as I see fit.
What dark mural comes to life today?
The battlefield is merely a canvas, waiting for my brush.
When all hope is gone, I remain.
My time comes. Theirs comes to an end.
The rules of this world bind me no more.
These wretched fools have no idea.
Hm hm hm hm ha ha ha. Grimstroke.
At last, the full majesty of my design.
Long have my people suffered for my ambitions.
Set in ink, as were it stone.
grow restless. Today we shackle more to join them.
The strokes of my brush mark your fate.
I alone hold back the ink tide.
In the face of what I've become, what are you?
I'll paint this world as I see fit.
What dark mural comes to life today?
The battlefield is merely a canvas, waiting for my brush.
These wretched fools have no idea.
When all hope is gone, I remain.
This contest is in the bag.
The bag didn't even exist before I arrived.
It isn't the bag you should be worried about, but the box.
I've painted a portrait of the bag, and in that portrait, this one is certainly in it.
My time comes. Theirs comes to an end.
The portrait of this battle will be painted in blood.
This world will never be the same.
As if they could stop me.
As if they could stop me.
The ink ripples in my wake.
I never knew you were so close.
The first two dominos ready to fall.
Trussed up and ready to serve.
Hm ha ha ha ha, you're welcome.
A new mixture for my pots!
The wails of my people fill the air!
Mh hm hm ha ha ha, oh yes!
Craft begets artistry. Artistry begets power!
Perhaps you'll be remembered after all.
A tiny stroke in my masterpiece.
Nothing impressive about you in the end.
Only in death is your true value realized.
You would thank me, if you understood.
The lines of your fate come to an end.
You die, yet your failure lives on.
Your blood's too thin for my pot.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha.
Mhm hm hm ha ha ha ha.
Aaa haah. Ha ha ha hahh.
Huuuh huh huh ha ha ha ha ha ha hahh.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Mhm mhm mh hm hm hm ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Pfth ah hahh hah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha aaah.
Mmmh he ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Haaahh ahah ha ha ha ha hahh.
Haa. Haa. He he he ha ha ha ha.
Your essence seeps into my collection.
The price of existence is too much for your kind.
Mine was the more potent mixture.
This is how your pathetic struggle ends, Anti-Mage.
You died as you lived, Anti-Mage. For nothing.
You come unbound, Warden. I merely finished what was already started.
of such power, I expected more.
I should take your corpse with me. Shame to let such potent ingredients go to waste.
Your napalm is nothing compared to my ink.
What can you expect from one who lays with beasts?
In the end, what you sought was your own demise.
You went through all this trouble to find me, the least I could do is watch you die.
How did one as dim as you even survive childhood?
The truth of things is always found in the ink.
Now you submit to my cause, Chen.
I would have preferred to let your suffering continue.
Not even the metallurgic arts can stop the strokes of my brush.
Your grave will be even colder, my dear.
I had hoped to sway you to my cause, Maiden. But your naiveté left me no choice.
I've no interest in the land beyond the wall. Take your secrets to the grave.
It seems our goals were in alignment, Prophet.
Speed you on your way, hag.
Your fall from grace has only just begun.
This is what happens to one trick ponies.
If you've no people of your own, Drow, you're welcome to join my flock.
You're about as smart as I'd expect a sentient rock to be.
Did I just put you out of your misery?
Your flame isn't even your own, Xin. What hope did you have against me?
At least you died with a smile on your face.
I'd hoped to learn more from your passing, Enigma.
I've got a lovely little box to put you in.
Where do these old fools even come from?
Live life on the edge, Huskar, and eventually you'll step over the line.
You should have vanished before I noticed you, Io.
If you're not of single mind, there's no hope to defeat me.
I take extra pleasure in destroying an original.
Sink beneath the waves of ink.
It takes more than a moment of courage, Tresdin.
You could've joined me, Leshrac. Such a waste.
Another self-styled king meets his end.
The mindless are of no use to me.
Best to snuff you out, before you get any bright ideas.
I'd heard you lost your edge, Luna. I should've killed you in your prime.
You were right, I do have an interest in antiquities. Hm hm hm hm ha ha ha ha.
I didn't even know about your horn before today, Magnus. I'll take it all the same.
A shame to free all your sculptures, but it can't be helped.
Now you've seen what a real martial art looks like.
Death doesn't suit you. Perhaps you'll grow into it.
I take little pleasure in killing such a beautiful creature.
I'd stick to the shadows too, were I as useless as you.
Not even luck can save you from me.
What, didn't believe you could die?
My hand alone shapes the future to come.
A life wasted on frivolous gallantry.
Your tale will live on, Donté. As a footnote in my legacy.
Your technique depends too much on luck, and too little on actual skill.
As I thought. Kill you and your brothers fall.
I'm not going to waste my breath taunting you.
You cannot escape the reach of my brush.
I'm glad I could be of service, Akasha.
To the trained eye, it's always easy to spot an imitation!
There's nothing in the desert that frightens me.
I thought perhaps I'd learn a thing or two. I guess not.
I told you I'd sample your collection, fiend.
You should've stuck to swindling rubes, Shadow Shaman.
The battlefield is no place for cheap parlor tricks.
When my ink flows, the silence is yours alone.
A fitting end for a philistine.
You should've kept your head in the fight.
This is a good look on you. Dead fish chic!
Dancing isn't art, Slark. It's frivolity.
A pathetic little man with a pathetic little toy.
Had to take care of that before things got out of hand.
Why is it every time I turn around you're there, Spectre?
Time to get you out of that skin suit, spirit!
I didn't think such hatred could grow in so short a span, but you've earned it.
How have you lived this long?
I need no secrets from you.
When the ink tide comes, there will be no retreat!
From the forest itself comes the handle of my brush!
One of my punishments as a boy was painting rocks. I like this better.
Enjoy your first taste of culture.
I hope your noble cause was worth dying for.
Slowing my brush only delays the inevitable.
Your natural talents weren't quite enough.
My time will never come, guardian!
You practice at the dark arts, Lannik. I perform them.
The whispers of your wind grow faint, ranger.
My only regret is you won't live to write about me.
I'll take what I please from your collection, and burn the rest.
You can't even help yourself, doctor.
I'll ensure your legend lives on, Ostarion, but not your reign.
A god turned mortal is more helpless than a child.
Toast the first droplets, and the torrents to come!
First blood! Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
First blood! I create nothing from something!
They say you always were. Now you'll never be again.
? This war should be easy to win.
I've no time for barely literate imbeciles.
If only you turned your attention from your barrel to the fight at hand.
A working class hero is nothing to me.
Mh mh mh ha ha ha, the way the legs twitch, I thought she was still alive.
I thought you'd survive longer than that.
were as interesting as you. And as weak.
Look what happens to a puppet when you cut the strings.
I send you to meet your kin!
Killing your kind is almost beneath me, cur!
We walk upon two forks of the same path, Abaddon.
The font of my power was not so obvious, Abaddon.
I hope the balance of your blends is just right today, Razzil.
Just between us, Kaldr, what's your stake in all this?
The normal ones grow out of their childhood dreams, Anti-Mage.
If I prod the other one, do you feel it?
Is "Zet" your name, or just a useful pronoun?
. But there is artistry in your moves.
Have you noticed the cascade of blood that whirls from your blade? It's quite captivating.
Your family must have been very wealthy, Batrider, to afford such a beast.
Do you clean up after that thing yourself, Batrider?
Your pets don't interest me, Beastmaster. I've some of my own.
I cannot wait to see what we can accomplish together, bloodbag.
by honor, Bloodseeker, or arcane oath?
Ready to double your money, Gondar?
There's something soothing about the sound of your voice, Gondar.
I'm no prude, Brewmaster. The time for revelry will come.
I work better with a clear mind, Brewmaster. But thank you all the same.
Are you actively trying to disgust me, Bristleback? Because it's working.
I'm guessing you lacked for role models as a child, Bristleback.
The lines of your webs accentuate the battlefield nicely, Arachnia.
We'll bring meaning to this battle, Centaur!
live inside you, Chaos Knight? Or do you summon them from the aether?
I understand your quest, Chaos Knight, but ask yourself this: What is the darkness without the light?
You act the honorable part, Chen. But you betray your true self in the service of charlatans.
Do you care for the animals in your charge, Chen? Or are they just pawns to be placed in battle?
Your tortured existence is a compelling argument against doing the right thing, Clinkz.
Such craftsmanship, Clockwerk. Your talents at the forge outstrip even the finest smiths.
Will you still don your armor once this battle is won, Clockwerk?
The fools here don't appreciate your talents, Maiden. You could be so much more.
They laugh at you, Rylai, yet you continue to smile. Make them fear you!
Your strategy matters little to me, Dark Seer, but I'm sure we'll find a way.
Have you ever been mistaken for someone else, Dazzle?
The remnants of my people also seek death, prophet. Don't give them any new ideas.
You're not allowed to die until the battle is over, Prophet.
There must be a hidden repository of your people somewhere, Disruptor. What secrets might we find there?
You're far too intelligent to fight for nothing at all, Doom. What's your true purpose?
I find your presence offensive, Xin!
stalker who was asking about your whereabouts.
My people might've preferred mere arson to the sins of my past.
Your magics are impressive, Invoker. But what's it all for?
Do you even remember your life's work, Invoker?
Let me lead the way, Lion. You'll know when to strike.
You understand, Lion. Nothing gained with nothing given.
I'm fairly certain I've met another druid before.
Your early works are impressive, Wukong, but I'm not a fan of the newer stuff.
Poor naga. Your sense of honor leads only to greater injustice.
Do you ever fall prey to a sudden reversal of inspiration, Oracle?
Was my rise foreseen, Oracle? What would have become of her... of us... had I taken another path?
Do you take anything seriously, Donté?
Any good secrets floating on the air, Riki?
I have a feeling we're going to get along famously, Shadow Demon.
I caught all of my souls at once, Nevermore. One at a time sounds... tedious.
We'll bring the two birds. Someone else can bring the stone.
Move along, Silencer. You'll find no friend in me.
You may move to quiet others, Silencer, but make no such trouble with me!
My power was also granted that it might serve others, Skywrath. But I chose a different path.
Thoughts of lost loves only entrap us in the past, Skywrath. Dwell not on what might have been.
I'll lure them into your trap, Slardar.
By blade and brush, this battle will be ours.
With an eye as keen as yours, you might have made a fine artist, Kardel.
Together, Spectre, we'll fight them on all fronts.
Tell me more about this master of yours, Bara. I've found nothing but rumors.
What made you choose this realm, Spirit Breaker? Some dark purpose?
wear you like a hat, Thunderkeg?
Don't make me lose what little respect I had for you, Raijin.
Twin hammers await our enemies, my taciturn friend.
The line between brilliance and buffoonery is shockingly thin.
We don't pair well together, Techies, but I expect you're used to that.
I've discovered a few secrets of my own, Lanaya. Want to compare notes?
Don't take my disinterest personally, Tidehunter. We've nothing in common.
Play your role well, and I'll have nothing but praise for you, Tidehunter.
Face it, Timbersaw, the trees are your muse, and look at what you've created!
The elegance of your designs intrigue me, Tinker.
A sentient rock? Hmh, ok, that's a new one.
I too was a protector, Treant... Or so my people thought.
Something about you really appeals to me, Troll, but I can't put my finger on it.
There's more to life than punching things as hard as you can.
like, Underlord? Paint me a picture.
, Undying. But I am something greater.
Honestly, I wasn't aware you were capable of speech, Ursa.
Is the scholar still in there, Venomancer?
The wonders of the natural world find a potent mix in you, Viper.
, Visage? I'm not done with them.
Your penmanship is surprisingly bad, Warlock.
So, you're just an interdimensional seamstress.
Trust me, Lyralei, you're better off not knowing your people.
There's grace in the form of a ranger.
I love a good collaboration, Wyvern. What do you say?
Your presence here honors me, Auroth.
If your strange rituals work, who am I to question?
For a doctor, you certainly inflict a lot of harm.
I must admit, Ostarion, you knew all along what I discovered only by accident.
Were your transgressions worth so steep a price, Zeus?
Love leads only to suffering, Zeus.
Strength always comes at a price.
That best be gold I hear.
Hm hm hm hm hm ha ha ha ha.
Hm hm hm ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha, that's something.
What do you have for me?
Strength always comes at a price.
That best be gold I hear.
Ugh huh huh huh. That's something.
What do you have for me?
The strong take what they desire.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Pftha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
The strong take what they desire.
What need have I for wealth?
Aghanim's power is now in the right hands.
My brush will fly across the battlefield!
My people should have bought me one of these.
I almost feel bad for our enemies.
A clumsy tool, but it gets the job done.
Strip the paint to the canvas.
I like to see what I'm working on.
There's more than one way to live forever.
My works will be remembered for all time!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
The revenants of my people will wash over this land.
The forms of my life fade from memory.
I trust my end comes at a price.
I hope it was worth it!
Does my line truly end here?
The grasping arms of my kin tried to hold me back.
Somewhere I beheld those who once placed their trust in me.
From the inky nether, I return.
My design is not yet realized.
The borders of my lifeline expand once again.
Those beyond the veil cannot touch me yet.
Nothing so trivial could ever stop me.
Those who cross me learn soon enough.
It takes more than that to kill me.
When my life is threatened, others suffer!
We'll get to the bottom of this.
Even in a bottle it can't stay fresh forever.
Where have you been all my life?
But I'm worth so much more.
Not as impressive as the original.
It's not in my nature, but...
Only once I'd grown strong enough, and the revenants could harm me no more.
In the first days, they'd hounded me. Driven me away! I had no control.
But in time, mastery came to me. Just as it always had.
My city. The temple around the rune stone. It was exactly as I'd left it. Still. Lifeless. A sculpture of the end of days.
Just the first dark mural brought to life by the tip of my brush.
How the spirits wailed at my arrival!
Staring into those faces once so dear to me... Did I feel sorrow?
You know as well as I, my people invited this fate upon themselves.
I'm not the last of my people. Those who ascended before me still remain.
shrink from me. They still hope our people can be saved.
The power of the Ascended Ones was warped by my transformation. They live... barely.
With the power of the Ancients in hand, the last remnants of my kind will learn, there is nowhere left to hide.
The hollow spaces I feel inside will at last be made whole.
It's seem a lifetime ago I last gave thanks.
Be careful throwing your lot in with mine.
This will come back to you.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha.
Mhm hm hm ha ha ha ha.
Aaa haah. Ha ha ha hahh.
Huuuh huh huh ha ha ha ha ha ha hahh.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Mhm mhm mh hm hm hm ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Pfth ah hahh hah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha aaah.
Mmmh he ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Haaahh ahah ha ha ha ha hahh.
Haa. Haa. He he he ha ha ha ha.
Aaah! Hu hu hu ha ha ha, victory!
There's nothing left to stand in my way!
As one power falls, another must rise!
Aaah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha, my masterpiece!
A new domain falls under the sway of my brush!
How could it come to this?
I fade into the ink tide!
Not necessary, but I'll take it.
You aren't ready for what I have planned.
You've a mind like a child.
Your struggles only illustrate your deficiencies.
Hm hm ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ho ho ha ha ha ha haa ha ha ha.
Hm hm ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
For that, I'll kill you last.
The benefits of a classical education.
